GLOBAL_STATUS.additional: If no name/mention/id is specified it returns the status of the person who executes the command

GLOBAL_HELP.brief: Returns the usage of a command

GLOBAL_SET_PREFIX.brief: Sets the prefix of the bot

GLOBAL_MODULE.brief: Controls all the modules of the bot
GLOBAL_MODULE.additional:
**module list** is used to list all the commands, if the name of a module is passed, it will list all the commands of that module
**module enable** is used to enable a disabled module
**module disable** is used to disable a module

GLOBAL_OUTPUT.brief: Controls the output of the bot

LEVEL_MODULE_TOP.brief: Returns the top of a specified user count
LEVEL_MODULE_TOP.usage:
top <count> (List of top people until <count>)
top <count1> <count2> (List of top people from <count1> to <count2>)
LEVEL_MODULE_TOP.additional:
**Example:
** `!top 3`: Displays the top 3 people. 
`!top 3 5`: Displays the 3rd, 4th and 5th top users.

LEVEL_MODULE_RANK.brief: Used to control the ranking system
LEVEL_MODULE_RANK.usage:
rank <list/add/remove/edit>
rank list
rank add <minimumLevel> <name>
rank remove <id>
rank edit <id> <level/name> <newlevel/newname>
LEVEL_MODULE_RANK.additional:
**rank list** returns the list of all the ranks, if any
**rank add** adds a rank with a minimum level and a name
**rank remove** removes a rank using an id
**rank edit** edits a rank using it's id

To get the id of a rank you must use **rank list**

LEVEL_MODULE_MAX_LEVEL.brief: Used to change the ranking system's maximum level
LEVEL_MODULE_MAX_LEVEL.additional: **setmaxlevel current** will return the current maximum level

LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_REQUIREMENT.brief: Used to change the ranking system's exp requirement
LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_REQUIREMENT.additional: **setexpreq current** will return the current exp requirement

LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_GROWTH_RATE.brief: Used to change the ranking system's exp growth rate
LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_GROWTH_RATE.additional:
The rate must be a number above 1
How the exp for the levels are calculated is like so:
CurrentLevel = LastLevel * GrowthRate
**setgrowthrate current** will return the current exp requirement

LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_GIVE.brief: Used to give exp to a user.
LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_GIVE.additional:
**givexp 50L user** will give 50 levels of experience to that user
**givexp 50 user**, will give 50 exp points to that user

LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_TAKE.brief: Used to take exp from a user.
LEVEL_MODULE_EXP_TAKE.additional:
**takexp 50L user** will take 50 levels of experience from that user
**takexp 50 user**, will take 50 exp points from that user

LEVEL_MODULE_BLOCK_EXP.brief: Controls the exp gain of the bot on specific channels

TIMEZONE_MODULE_TIMEOFFSET.brief: Sets the timezone offset of the user.
TIMEZONE_MODULE_TIMEOFFSET.additional:
Where offset is the timezone offset from **UTC**
If your timezone is UTC+3 then your offset is +3

MODERATION_INVITATION_TOGGLE.brief: Toggles if invitations should be automatically deleted

CURRENCY_WALLET.brief: Shows the user's current amount of credits.

CURRENCY_DAILY.brief: Collects the user's extra credits for the day.
CURRENCY_DAILY.additional: The daily reward resets every 24hrs. Make sure to collect it everytime!

CURRENCY_GAMBLE.brief: Play a game of gamble with the command.
CURRENCY_GAMBLE.additional:
This is a number guessing game which can earn you extra credits. There are two ways to play: 

**Normal: **In this mode you use the default bet amount to gamble.
*Usage:* `!gamble` 

**Double or Nothing: ** In this mode you can bet whatever amount under 100 credits.
 *Usage:* `!gamble <betAmount>`

CURRENCY_CLAIM.brief: Claims the giveaway prize (credits) when it comes out.
CURRENCY_CLAIM.additional: Don't use it unless the bot notifies everyone of a giveaway!

CURRENCY_SET_PRIZE_CHANNEL.brief: Sets the giveaway announcement channel to the current channel in use.

CURRENCY_SET_GAMBLE_LOSS.brief: Sets the amount to be taken when the player loses in the normal gamble mode.

CURRENCY_SET_GAMBLE_REWARD.brief: Sets the amount to be rewarded when the player wins in the normal gamble mode.

CURRENCY_SET_GAMBLE_MIN_GUESS.brief: Sets the minimum guess number for the gamble mode.

CURRENCY_SET_GAMBLE_MAX_GUESS.brief: Sets the maximum guess number for the gamble mode.

CURRENCY_SET_PRIZE_PROB.brief: Sets the probability that the freebie giveaway occurs for each message.

CURRENCY_SET_PRIZE_EXPIRY.brief: Sets the expriy time (in seconds) for the freebie giveaway at the end of the day (when it has not been claimed).

CURRENCY_RICH_LIST.brief: Displays the top 30 rich people on the server
CURRENCY_RICH_LIST.additional: Make sure you're in the list!

CURRENCY_DONATE.brief: Distributes an equal amount of credits (specified by you) from your wallet among the people you listed (pinged).
CURRENCY_DONATE.additional: **Example: ** `!donate 20 @Person1 @Person2` gives both Person1 and Person2 10 credits each.

CURRENCY_STEAL.brief: Chance to steal an amount from a user, otherwise it will fine you.
CURRENCY_STEAL.additional: **Example: ** `!steal 20 @Person1` will try to steal 20 credits from Person 1

CURRENCY_SET_STEAL_SUCCESS_CHANCE.brief: Sets the chance (as a percentage) that a !steal will succeed.

CURRENCY_SET_STEAL_FINE_PERCENT.brief: Sets the amount (as a percentage of what they tried to steal) that the theif will get fined.

CURRENCY_SET_STEAL_VICTIM_BONUS.brief: Sets the amount (as a percentage of what the theif tried to steal) that the victim will get.

CURRENCY_SET_STEAL_JAIL_HOURS.brief: Sets the number of hours that a theif will spend in jail.

CURRENCY_SET_DAILY_BONUS_AMOUNT.brief: Sets the bonus amount for dailies.

CURRENCY_SET_DAILY_BONUS_PERIOD.brief: Sets how often (in days) the bonus is granted.
